metadata.title: CVE-2016-4484 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The Debian initrd script for the cryptsetup package 2:1.7.3-2 and earlierallows physically proximate attackers to gain shell access via many log inattempts with an invalid password.

criterions.comment: cryptsetup: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ignored by upstream').
